message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not giving up my majority share!
I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not going to let you take the majority!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up my last chance at a decent share!
I'll give you a small token, but I'm not giving up on getting most of the money!
I'll give you a small token, but I'm not giving up yet! It's now or never!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm not going to give up my majority share now!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm not going down without a fight!
I'll give you a tiny token, but I'm not going to let you take anything more from me!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm not giving up yet! It's almost over, Bob!
I'll give you a tiny morsel, but I'm not going to give up my last chance at getting most of the money!
